# Panikpak Window & Door Replacement, Aulavik National Park

## Government of Canada Tender Annoucement

### Reference Information

* Solicitation Number: 5P468-23-0236/A
* Tender Publication Date: 2023-12-14
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-16, 16:00 (Mountain Standard Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-10-31

### Contract Details

* Contracting Entity: Parks Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: John Umuerri
	+ Email: [john.umuerri@pc.gc.ca](mailto:john.umuerri@pc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (431) 335-6240
	+ Fax: 1-855-983-1808
	+ Address: 145 McDermot Ave, Winnipeg, MB, R3B 0R9, Canada

### Tender Description

Parks Canada requires a contractor to replace sixteen windows and two doors for the Parks Canada/Hamlet Panikpak Office building located in Sachs Harbour, Aulavik National Park. The scope of work includes replacement of windows and doors, patching, repairing, and repainting of interior walls that are impacted, millwork refurbishment, new flooring, and some additional painting.

### Notice Type and Method of Procurement

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Method of Procurement: Competitive - Open bidding

### Selection Criteria

The selection of the contractor will be based on the lowest price.

### Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Northwest Territories

Please let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with.  I also ensured that the message did not exceed 400 words.  The original information shared by the contractors may indicate a two stage process, but there is no doubt that the contract details can now be handled as a normal tender solicitation.
